subject: Order SSN1687
description_text:
Hi

As you didn't yet dispatch or communicate at all with me, I am now asking
you to cancel the order and refund me right away.
Please confirm!!!
Cheers ariel Sztokman

conversations.body_text: Hi ariel sztokman,  Your PlusX pedal and Pro X Ultra upgrade kit will be shipped shortly.      Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.

      描述:  Hi When are you going to ship my order? 
 Thanks  
 Ariel sztokman

Hi ariel sztokman, We hope you’re not upset — we sincerely apologize for not responding to your email in a timely manner yesterday. Your order was unfortunately delayed due to some component supply issues over the past few days. We will expedite the shipment of your PlusX and the upgrade kit as soon as possible.

Please expedite a full refund and cancellation of my order.

Kind regards
Ariel sztokman

Hi ariel sztokman,  Of course, no problem. Once our operations team is on duty this afternoon, we will promptly confirm whether your PlusX and ProX upgrade kits have been shipped. If they haven’t been shipped yet, we will issue a full refund. If they have already been shipped, we won’t be able to cancel that part of the order, but we can cancel the VAM motor portion instead. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
I don't believe it has been shipped yet, please refund me.

Hi，Ariel Stockman，        We have indeed shipped the order. Your order number is [Order Number], and it was shipped on June 9th. You placed the order on June 8th, and due to delayed platform updates, some information might have been delayed. Below is the 17track tracking link and tracking number, and we have also included a screenshot of the tracking progress, which shows that everything is normal.  ​         https://www.17track.net/en     JSEXE0988433308YQ

Hi

I am a bit disappointed with the delivery service.
I received the pedals rather quickly but the rest of my order didn't come
together with it.
Today I received a second parcel with only part of the rest of my order and
it is really not ok.
The rest of my order (tracking number SF6045775261718) is still in China
with no movement since the 21st.
I deserve not just an explanation but a compensation as well as you said
you will ship the rest with a fast delivery service which was not the case.
I am missing from my order the Haptic motors and power supply.
I am very disappointed, the pedals are very nice but you really let me down
with the delivery service.
Please let me know what are you going to do about this situation

regards
Ariel Sztokman


On Wed, 11 Jun 2025 at 03:58, support@simsonn.com

Hi ariel sztokman,  Due to a delay in the supply of some components from the first batch of VAM Pro, we have arranged split shipments: the pedals were sent out first, followed by the motors. Please rest assured that we will ensure your entire order is delivered without any missing parts.

It's very wrong to sell a product that you don't have in stock.
At the time if purchase, I asked for cancellation and full refund but it
was literally IGNORED.
Now I have to wait for the motors to arrive, it was promised a fast
delivery service and again, I was misled because in fact it's a slow
delivery service.
Please be professional and offer me a solution to this delay, not just
words!
The motors are still in China, please do something about it.
Regards
Ariel sztokman

Hi ariel sztokman,     Sorry, your parcel is expected to arrive on the 28th, we have marked the dispatch time on the product page and emphasised that this is a pre-order only. We're sorry for the delay, sincere apologies!  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045775261718
